text_block_list.text: On New Year's Eve, Me, Winning Ticket, Narita Taishin and Biwa Hayahide came to our first shrine visit of the year together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wow～, there are many people here! The shrine visit of the New Year is like a Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Like I said, aren't there many people here? It's the same with the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Everything you say and think of always connects with the Derby in the end…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Later on, she might say that the washing machine is as noisy as the Derby.
Even so, the 3 of you achieved good results this year.
Even so, the 3 of you achieved good results this year.
Winning Ticket won 2 races in a row after her first win. The other 2 were also successful.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It was frustrating that I didn't get the “Best Junior” Award…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I was wondering if I could get it, I had some hope.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Look here, it's because If you were chosen at the awards ceremony, you would just cry up there.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: If I really lost the election for that reason, that would be too mean!
You 3 will be able to reach the classic soon. Just be proud of it.
You 3 will be able to reach the classic soon. Just be proud of it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah-yeah! “SatsukiShou” and “Japan Derby” and “Kikkashou” ! Especially the Derby, the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No matter which one you win, it's an honor… It's something I want to make a priority.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'm gonna ask god properly for help! May you win the “Yayoi Prize” and get to compete in the classic race!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: After that! To run with Taishin and Hayaide! Banban!
Friends who have promised to run together in the same raceー This is the goal they have been pursuing from the time these 3 girls became classmates.
And that goal was about to be achieved sooner than expected.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey! Hot news-big news～～!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Guess what, it was decided that Taishin will also appear in the “Yayoi Prize” the same in which Tickezou will take part in!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin will!? Wow～～! The time has finally come to race together～～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: haha, you can't afford to be only happy. Taishin-san's strong performance is about to become a hot topic.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! That's why I have to do my best too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! I want to increase my top speed down my final spurt…
What you're saying is getting more and more specific. It is evidence that you can think about what exactly you want to train.
What you're saying is getting more and more specific. It is evidence that you can think about what exactly you want to train.
The presence of rivals is inspiring for Winning Ticket in a good way.
An irreplaceable presence that elevates one another… In order to respond to such an existence, Narita Taishinー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Come at me!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The day of the “Yayoi Prize” has arrived! Each Horse Girl is coming up on the turf!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey! We're walking down the underground road together! Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Don't make a loud noise, it will echo.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Haha, you 2 are the same as always.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: After all, we are rivals, a rival! “Friend” is written down as “Rival”!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Just leave it at that!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Running together with Ticket is certainly something special, but I will run the same as always, nothing will change.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Run with all my might, and go for the win.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it's the same for me! Running together is not a goal, we have to win properly!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Show me how both of you run. You have to race in the name of your rivals.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Of course!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I will be going.
And finally, as the first confrontation with a friend happened at the “Yayoi Prize” the fans' cheers echoed.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Which Horse Girl will win the “Yayoi Prize”? All Horse Girls are currently at the gateー

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now, they started!
